text:
Richard Austen Butler, Baron Butler of Saffron Walden KG CH PC DL (9 December 1902 – 8 March 1982), also known as R.A. Butler or by his initials as "Rab" Butler, was a Deputy Prime Minister of the United Kingdom in 1962 to 1963 for one year.
Butler died of colon cancer on 8 March 1982 at Great Yeldham, Essex.

annotations.surface_form: Deputy Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
